product_name: NRS Chaos Full Cut Whitewater Helmet
long_description: The NRS Chaos Full Cut Whitewater helmet help protect your ears from splashes and, should you ever need it, unintended impacts. Protect what counts with the tough, ABS shell. Closed-cell EVA foam liner further enhances impact protection, and dual-density construction increases comfort. Helmet adjustment system and adjustable chin strap ensures a comfortable fit without pressure points. The NRS Chaos Full Cut Whitewater helmet features 8 ports to drain water and increase ventilation, and 3 ports over each ear enhance hearing.
short_description: The NRS Chaos Full Cut Whitewater helmet help protect your ears from splashes and, should you ever need it, unintended impacts.
